title: Team-Based e-Learning Content Development: Collaborative Learning Using Shared Mental Models (SMM)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where teams design/develop math e-learning content in VR/simulation environments, enhancing collaboration through role distribution

learning_goals: Establish a Shared Mental Model (SMM) necessary for the math education content development process through effective communication among team members.
Design and implement team-based e-Learning content that visually represents mathematical concepts using VR/simulation tools.

Analyze collaboration issues (e.g., role differentiation, reduced communication across progress stages) that arose during the content development process and propose improvements through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
